title: ECP extends LG polls nomination papers filing by four days
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 16 (APP): The Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP) Thursday extended the deadline for filing nomination papers for participating in local government polls in Islamabad by four more days.
In a notification, the ECP stated that the people willing to file their nomination papers could now complete the process till June 20.
Earlier, June 16 was set as the last date for filing the nomination.
According to a statement issued by the ECP, the LG polls in Islamabad would be held on July 31.
